title: Simple Expression Evaluator
description:
Create a sealed expression hierarchy:
- record Num(int value)
- record Add(Expr left, Expr right)

Write an evaluate method using pattern matching.
Test: evaluate(Add(Num(3), Num(4))) should return 7

Expected output: 7
instructions:
Create a sealed expression hierarchy:
- record Num(int value)
- record Add(Expr left, Expr right)

Write an evaluate method using pattern matching.

hints.text: sealed interface Expr permits Num, Add {}
Add has two Expr children - use recursion to evaluate them

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to recursively evaluate nested expressions
